column4: GlobalTech Industries, 200+ employee tech company, transitioning from paper HR records to digital. column4: RetailMart regional retail chain, 15 stores, 500+ SKUs. Operations Manager David Martinez overwhelmed with Excel tracking. CEO approved digital transformation. Need database tracking: SKU, category (Electronics/Clothing/Home Goods), prices, stock quantities, reorder levels, suppliers. Finance requires non-negative prices, Warehouse Manager insists no negative inventory.

column4: E-Shop online platform processes 100+ orders daily. Customer Service Manager Lisa Thompson reports 10-15 minute delays cross-referencing spreadsheets. CFO requires automatic cascade deletion of line items when orders deleted.
